mdRecord.dcterms:title: Ictotest reagent tablets
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Ames Company [manufacturer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Brown glass bottle with purple cap filled with tablets. Label information: No. 2590; Icotest (brand) reagent tablets; test for urine bilirubin; Patent pending; Active ingredients: p-nitrobenzene diazonium p-toluene sulfonate, sulfosalicylic acid, sodium bicarbonate; Ames Company, Inc. Elkhart, Indiana, U.S.A. Directions on back of bottle.
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medical laboratory technology
